reviewText: These are 4 of his really good movies and it is subtitled. Which is a must for me. I enjoyed them very much although Fountainhead wasn't my favorite I love the other 3.
Title: TCM Greatest Classic Films: Legends - Gary Cooper

reviewText: One of my favorite actors, Good mix of not so common films with Sgt. York. Worth the price to buy.
Title: TCM Greatest Classic Films: Legends - Gary Cooper

reviewText: What can I say? I love Gary Cooper. Sergeant York is one of my favorites with a cast that includes a very young June Lockhart and young Walter Brennan.  The FountainHead is good And I believe Ayn Rand wrote the screen play for the movie. They are all good movies from the good old days.
Title: TCM Greatest Classic Films: Legends - Gary Cooper

reviewText: I would have bought this DVD for York alone, so it was a bonus to get the other movies as well. If you are a Gary Cooper fan these are all must have's for your movie collections.
summary: I would have bought this DVD for York alone, ...
Title: TCM Greatest Classic Films: Legends - Gary Cooper

reviewText: These are movies that I wanted in my library.  I bought it because I think that Gary Cooper is a great actor and even though I had already watched each movie, I wanted to see them again.
Title: TCM Greatest Classic Films: Legends - Gary Cooper

reviewText: Gary Cooper was an icon in the 50's and 60's for me as a teenager.  I loved going to the movies on Saturday night. Gary Cooper always deliver a believable character with certain manly emotions.  He is totally different type of male star to what you see today.
summary: Great group of movies of Gary Cooper
Title: TCM Greatest Classic Films: Legends - Gary Cooper
